name: Psycho Seeker
description: Who is the culprit? Should we depend on our judgment from other people’s opinions? There’s always a story behind every crime. How do we consider someone a criminal? Psycho Seeker is a playable story where the player roles as a detective who must solve a crime in a strange town called 404 Creeptown, Strangerville. 404 Creeptown, Strangerville is a town like no other. The town itself feels eerie, and the townies all seem to be against each other. It truly is a dog-eat-dog world in this society. The player must use their detective skills as well as their gut instincts to solve 404 Creeptown’s most heinous mystery, the kidnapping of 15-year-old, Jane Wilson. The player will encounter many townies and possible suspects. They must read between the lines in order to come to the conclusion. Some stories may be obvious but sometimes not everything is black and white. In addition, features include narration and thought-process narration and red indicators to help guide the player through the playable story.
